io.spine.server.commandbus

Class CommandSequence<O extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends io.spine.base.EventMessage,B extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder,S extends CommandSequence<O,R,B,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence<O,R,B,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the type of origin ID which caused the sequence
    R - the type of the result generated when the command sequence is posted
    B - the type of the result builder
    S - the type of the sequence for the return type covariance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SeveralCommands, SingleCommand, Split, Transform

    @Internal
public abstract class CommandSequence<O extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends io.spine.base.EventMessage,B extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder,S extends CommandSequence<O,R,B,S>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A sequence of commands to be posted to CommandBus.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CommandSequence.ErrorHandler
      A callback for errors occurred during posting a command from the sequence to the CommandBus.

      Adds the posted command to the result builder.
      protected abstract B newBuilder()
      Creates a new builder for the result generated when all the commands are posted.

      Defines a custom handler for posting errors.

      protected R postAll(CommandBus bus)
      Posts all commands to the CommandBus in the order that they were added.

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
protected S add(io.spine.base.CommandMessage commandMessage)
        Adds a command message to the sequence of commands to be posted.

      • onError

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public S onError(CommandSequence.ErrorHandler handler)
        Defines a custom handler for posting errors.

        When the handler is not defined CommandPostingException will be thrown if an error occurs.

      • size

        protected int size()
        Obtains the size of the command sequence.

      • postAll

        protected R postAll(CommandBus bus)
        Posts all commands to the CommandBus in the order that they were added.

        The size of the sequence after this method is zero if all the commands were posted successfully.
